mapper.delete: delete from LOA_PERMISSION where PERMISSION_ID = #{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SUBSYSTEM_FLAG = '3'
mapper.insert: insert into LOA_PERMISSION (PERMISSION_ID, PERMISSION_NAME, PERMISSION_LINK, ROOT_FLAG, PARENT_ID, ACTIVE_FLAG, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON) values (#{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rootFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update LOA_PERMISSION set PERMISSION_NAME = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERMISSION_LINK = #{permissionLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROOT_FLAG = #{rootFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_FLAG = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PERMISSION_ID = #{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PERMISSION_ID, PERMISSION_NAME, PERMISSION_LINK, ROOT_FLAG, PARENT_ID, ACTIVE_FLAG, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON from LOA_PERMISSION where PERMISSION_ID = #{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELETE_FLAG='0' and SUBSYSTEM_FLAG = '3' order by length(order_no) asc, order_no asc

select PERMISSION_ID, PERMISSION_NAME, PERMISSION_LINK, ROOT_FLAG, PARENT_ID, ACTIVE_FLAG, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON from LOA_PERMISSION where DELETE_FLAG='0' and SUBSYSTEM_FLAG = '3' order by length(order_no) asc, ORDER_NO asc

select p.PERMISSION_ID, p.PERMISSION_NAME, p.PERMISSION_LINK, p.ROOT_FLAG, p.PARENT_ID, p.ACTIVE_FLAG, p.CREATE_DATETIME, p.CREATE_PERSON from LOA_PERMISSION p left join LOA_PERMISSION_RELATION pr on p.PERMISSION_ID=pr.PERMISSION_ID where pr.ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.DELETE_FLAG='0' and SUBSYSTEM_FLAG = '3' order by length(order_no) asc, p.order_no asc

select PERMISSION_ID as id,PERMISSION_NAME as name,PERMISSION_LINK as tree_url,ORDER_NO as orderNo from LOA_PERMISSION where
parent_Id is null
parent_Id = #{parentId}
and delete_flag != '1'
order by length(order_no) asc, order_no asc
order by PERMISSION_ID
mapper.update: update LOA_PERMISSION set DELETE_FLAG = '1' where permission_id = #{permission.permissionId}
mapper.select: select p.permission_id, p.permission_name, p.permission_link, p.root_flag, p.parent_id, p.active_flag, p.delete_flag, p.order_no, p.CREATE_PERSON, p.SUBSYSTEM_FLAG, pr.id as Loa_Permission_Relation_id, pr.role_id from LOA_PERMISSION p inner join Loa_Permission_Relation pr on p.permission_id = pr.permission_id where pr.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.delete_flag='0' and p.subsystem_flag='3' order by length(order_no) asc, p.order_no asc

select p.permission_id, p.permission_name, p.permission_link, p.root_flag, p.parent_id, p.active_flag, p.delete_flag, p.order_no, p.CREATE_PERSON, p.SUBSYSTEM_FLAG from LOA_PERMISSION p where p.subsystem_flag=#{subSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.delete_flag='0' order by p.order_no asc

select p.permission_id, p.permission_name, p.permission_link, p.root_flag, p.parent_id, p.active_flag, p.delete_flag, p.order_no, p.CREATE_PERSON, p.SUBSYSTEM_FLAG, pr.id as Loa_Permission_Relation_id, pr.role_id from LOA_PERMISSION p, Loa_Permission_Relation pr where p.permission_id = pr.permission_id and pr.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.subsystem_flag=#{subSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.delete_flag='0' order by p.order_no asc

select distinct p.permission_id, p.permission_name, p.permission_link, p.root_flag, p.parent_id, p.active_flag, p.delete_flag, p.order_no, p.CREATE_PERSON, p.SUBSYSTEM_FLAG from LOA_PERMISSION p, Loa_Permission_Relation pr where p.permission_id = pr.permission_id and exists (select 1 from loa_role_relation lrr where lrr.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pr.role_id=lrr.role_id) and p.subsystem_flag=#{subSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.delete_flag='0' order by p.order_no asc
